mlr3torch 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Base Class for Torch Wrappers

    torch_wrapper.Rd

    Abstract Base Class from which TorchLoss, TorchOptimizer, and TorchCallback inherit. This class wraps a generator (R6Class Generator or the torch version of such a generator) and annotates it.

    Format

    R6Class

    Arguments

    man

    (character(1))
    String in the format [pkg]::[topic] pointing to a manual page for this object. The referenced help package can be opened via method $help().

    Construction

    TorchWrapper$new(generator, id, param_set = NULL, packages = NULL, label = id, man = NULL)

    • generator :: function or R6ClassGenerator
      The wrapped generator that is described.

    • id :: character(1)
      The identifier of the object. Used to e.g. retrieve it from a dictionary.

    • param_set :: paradox::ParamSet
      The parameter set that describes the arguments of the generator.

    • packages :: character()
      The packages the generator depends on.

    • label :: character(1)
      The label, which is used for printing. Defaults to id.

    • man :: (character(1))
      String in the format [pkg]::[topic] pointing to a manual page for this object.

    Parameters

    Defined by the constructor argument param_set.

    Fields

    • generator :: function or R6ClassGenerator
      The wrapped generator that is described.

    • id :: character(1)
      The identifier of the object. Used to e.g. retrieve it from a dictionary.

    • param_set :: paradox::ParamSet
      The parameter set that describes the arguments of the generator.

    • packages :: character()
      The packages the generator depends on.

    • label :: character(1)
      The label, which is used for printing. Defaults to id.

    • man :: (character(1))
      String in the format [pkg]::[topic] pointing to a manual page for this object. The referenced help package can be opened via method $help().

    Methods

    • generate()
      () -> any Calls the generator with the given parameter values.

    • print(...)
      () -> CallbackTorch Prints the object.

    • help()
      () -> help file
      Displays the help file of the wrapped object.

    Internals

    When a deep clone is created, the wrapped generator is not cloned.

    See also

    Other torch_wrappers: mlr3torch_losses

    Developed by Sebastian Fischer, Lukas Burk, Martin Binder.
